title: Braum Chromas?????
body: So i heard that the new braum chromas would be available as of this most recent patch, but when i went to look in the store, they were nowhere to be found. Then when i picked braum for a game, it said that he did in fact have the chromas available. Whats going on with that?

replies.body: Yeah this is making me angry honestly. The squares are there for the chromas but they arent in the store i just want them already {{item:3070}}

Ohhh Braum chromas, that's going to be good!  Per the [6.22 patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-622-notes#patch-upcoming-skins-and-chromas), it looks like these are aimed during the patch at some point- not necessarily on patch launch.  Stand behind Braum until it comes!
